sqlMap.statement:
SELECT R.RESULEKEY,R.TEMPLATEKEY,R.PARTY_ID, R.PARTY_CHN_NAME, R.LEVELKEY,R.FRISTAPPRALEVEL, R.EMENDATIONLEVEL, R.STATISTIC_DT,R.MODIFYDATE, R.ORGANKEY,R.PARTY_CLASS_CD,R.TEMPTYPE,R.CURR_POST,R.CREATE_DT,R.MODIFY_CD,LASTLEVELKEY,LASTCHECKFLAG,R.TEMPCATEGORY,R.DEALMAX_DT FROM T37_PARTY_RESULT R
R.ORGANKEY IN ($organStr$)
R.status_cd=#status_cd#
R.CURR_POST =#post_id#
R.TEMPCATEGORY IN ($tempcategory_c$)
R.TEMPCATEGORY =#tempcategory_s#
STATISTIC_DT >= #statistic_dt#
STATISTIC_DT <= #statistic_dt_end#
MODIFYDATE >= #modifydate#
MODIFYDATE <= #modifydate_end#
CREATE_DT >= #create_dt#
CREATE_DT <= #create_dt_end#
R.PARTY_ID =#party_id#
R.PARTY_CLASS_CD = #party_class_cd#
R.ORGANKEY = #organkey#
R.FRISTAPPRALEVEL = #fristappralevel#
R.emendationlevel=#emendationlevel# and R.MODIFY_CD='1'
R.TEMPTYPE = #temptype#
R.status_cd IN ('6','7')
R.status_cd='7'
ORDER BY R.PARTY_CLASS_CD
ORDER BY R.ORGANKEY
ORDER BY R.PARTY_CHN_NAME
ORDER BY R.PARTY_ID
DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T37_PARTY_RESULT R
R.ORGANKEY IN ($organStr$)
R.status_cd=#status_cd#
R.CURR_POST =#post_id#
R.TEMPCATEGORY IN ($tempcategory_c$)
R.TEMPCATEGORY =#tempcategory_s#
STATISTIC_DT >= #statistic_dt#
STATISTIC_DT <= #statistic_dt_end#
MODIFYDATE >= #modifydate#
MODIFYDATE <= #modifydate_end#
CREATE_DT >= #create_dt#
CREATE_DT <= #create_dt_end#
R.PARTY_ID =#party_id#
R.PARTY_CLASS_CD = #party_class_cd#
R.ORGANKEY = #organkey#
R.FRISTAPPRALEVEL = #fristappralevel#
R.emendationlevel=#emendationlevel# and R.MODIFY_CD='1'
R.TEMPTYPE = #temptype#
R.status_cd IN ('6','7')
R.status_cd='7'

SELECT R.RESULEKEY,R.TEMPLATEKEY,R.PARTY_ID, R.PARTY_CHN_NAME, R.LEVELKEY,R.FRISTAPPRALEVEL, R.EMENDATIONLEVEL, R.STATISTIC_DT,R.MODIFYDATE, R.ORGANKEY,R.PARTY_CLASS_CD,R.TEMPTYPE,R.CURR_POST,R.CREATE_DT,R.MODIFY_CD,LASTLEVELKEY,LASTCHECKFLAG FROM T37_PARTY_RESULT_UH R
R.ORGANKEY IN ($organStr$)
R.PARTY_ID =#party_id#
R.ORGANKEY = #organkey#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T37_PARTY_RESULT_UH R
R.ORGANKEY IN ($organStr$)
R.PARTY_ID =#party_id#
R.ORGANKEY = #organkey#

SELECT A.AUDIT_NO,A.LAST_UPD_DT,A.LAST_UPD_USER,A.LEVEL_BEFORE_ADJUST,A.LEVEL_AFTER_ADJUST, A.RES_POST_ID, A.ADJUST_REASON,A.POST_ID FROM T37_LEVEL_AUDIT A WHERE A.RSLTKEY=#resulekey#
A.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
A.STATISTIC_DT = #statistic_dt#

SELECT A.AUDIT_NO,A.LAST_UPD_DT,A.LAST_UPD_USER,A.LEVEL_BEFORE_ADJUST,A.LEVEL_AFTER_ADJUST, A.RES_POST_ID, A.ADJUST_REASON,A.POST_ID FROM T37_LEVEL_AUDIT_UH A WHERE A.RSLTKEY=#resulekey#
A.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
A.STATISTIC_DT = #statistic_dt#

SELECT A.RESULEKEY,T.ELEMENTKEY,T.BASE_OCC, A.SCORE, A.OLD_SCORE,T.UPELEMENTKEY,A.BASIC_VAL,A.BASE_SCORE,T.ELEMENTNAME FROM T37_APPR_BAS_RSLT A,T31_DEF_ELEMENT T WHERE A.ELEMENTKEY=T.ELEMENTKEY
A.RESULEKEY=#resulekey#
A.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
A.STATISTIC_DT = #statistic_dt#

SELECT A.RESULEKEY,T.ELEMENTKEY,T.BASE_OCC, A.SCORE, A.OLD_SCORE,T.UPELEMENTKEY,A.BASIC_VAL,A.BASE_SCORE,T.ELEMENTNAME FROM T37_APPR_BAS_RSLT_UH A,T31_DEF_ELEMENT T WHERE A.ELEMENTKEY=T.ELEMENTKEY
A.RESULEKEY=#resulekey#
A.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
A.STATISTIC_DT = #statistic_dt#

SELECT T.ELEMENTKEY,T.BASE_OCC,T.UPELEMENTKEY,T.TEMPLATEKEY,T.ELEMENTNAME,T.JS_TYPE FROM T31_DEF_ELEMENT T WHERE T.IS_LAST='0'
T.TEMPLATEKEY=#templatekey#

SELECT max(T.TREELAYE) FROM T31_DEF_ELEMENT T
T.TEMPLATEKEY=#templatekey#

SELECT A.RESULEKEY,A.ELEMENT_SCORE,A.STATISTIC_DT,A.ORGANKEY,T.ELEMENTKEY,T.BASE_OCC,T.UPELEMENTKEY,T.ELEMENTNAME,T.TEMPLATEKEY FROM T37_APPR_ELEM_RSLT A,T31_DEF_ELEMENT T WHERE A.ELEMENTKEY=T.ELEMENTKEY AND A.UPELEMENTKEY IN (SELECT ELEMENTKEY FROM T31_DEF_ELEMENT WHERE TEMPLATEKEY=#templatekey# AND UPELEMENTKEY='-1' )
A.RESULEKEY=#resulekey#
A.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
A.STATISTIC_DT = #statistic_dt#

SELECT A.RESULEKEY,A.ELEMENTKEY,A.PARTY_ID,A.STATISTIC_DT,A.BASE_OCC,A.ELEMENT_SCORE,A.UPELEMENTKEY,GRANULARITY FROM T37_APPR_ELEM_RSLT A
A.UPELEMENTKEY=#elementkey#
A.RESULEKEY=#resulekey#
A.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
A.STATISTIC_DT = #statistic_dt#

SELECT A.RESULEKEY,A.ELEMENTKEY,A.PARTY_ID,A.STATISTIC_DT,A.BASE_OCC,A.SCORE,A.UPELEMENTKEY,GRANULARITY FROM T37_APPR_BAS_RSLT A
A.UPELEMENTKEY=#elementkey#
A.RESULEKEY=#resulekey#
A.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
A.STATISTIC_DT = #statistic_dt#

UPDATE T37_PARTY_RESULT T SET T.STATUS_CD=#status_cd#,T.CURR_POST=#curr_post#
emendationlevel = #emendationlevel#
levelkey = #emendationlevel#
modify_cd = #modify_cd#
modifier = #modifier#
modifydate = #modifydate#
lastscore = #lastscore#
audit_user = #audit_user#
audit_dt = #audit_dt#
check_user = #check_user#
check_dt = #check_dt#
rcheck_user = #rcheck_user#
rcheck_dt = #rcheck_dt#
nextstatistic_dt = #nextstatistic_dt#
WHERE T.RESULEKEY IN ($resulekey$)
T.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
T.STATISTIC_DT = #statistic_dt#
T.ORGANKEY IN ($organkey_s$)

UPDATE T37_PARTY_RESULT T SET
T.LASTSCORE = #lastscore#
WHERE T.RESULEKEY =#resulekey#
T.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
$sql$

SELECT R.RESULEKEY,R.PARTY_ID,R.ORGANKEY, R.PARTY_CHN_NAME, R.LEVELKEY,R.FRISTAPPRALEVEL, R.EMENDATIONLEVEL,R.TEMPTYPE,R.GRANULARITY,R.TEMPLATEKEY, R.STATISTIC_DT,R.PARTY_CLASS_CD,R.CURR_POST,R.GSKEY,R.SCORE,R.LASTSCORE,R.RETURN_REASON,R.ORGANKEY FROM T37_PARTY_RESULT R WHERE R.RESULEKEY =#resulekey#
R.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
R.STATISTIC_DT = #statistic_dt#

SELECT R.RESULEKEY,R.PARTY_ID,R.TEMPLATEKEY, R.PARTY_CHN_NAME, R.LEVELKEY,R.FRISTAPPRALEVEL, R.EMENDATIONLEVEL,R.TEMPTYPE,R.GRANULARITY, R.STATISTIC_DT,R.PARTY_CLASS_CD,R.CURR_POST,R.ORGANKEY FROM T37_PARTY_RESULT_UH R WHERE R.RESULEKEY =#resulekey#
R.ORGANKEY=#organkey#

SELECT R.RESULEKEY,R.PARTY_ID,R.GSKEY,R.STATISTIC_DT,R.INDICKEY,R.TEMPLATEKEY,R.GRANULARITY,R.INDICVAL FROM T37_GS_INDIC_VAL R WHERE R.RESULEKEY =#resulekey#
R.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
R.STATISTIC_DT = #statistic_dt#

SELECT R.RESULEKEY,R.PARTY_ID,R.GSKEY,R.STATISTIC_DT,R.INDICKEY,R.TEMPLATEKEY,R.GRANULARITY,R.INDICVAL FROM T37_GS_INDIC_VAL_UH R WHERE R.RESULEKEY =#resulekey#
R.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
R.STATISTIC_DT = #statistic_dt#

INSERT INTO T37_LEVEL_AUDIT( AUDIT_NO,PARTY_ID,STATISTIC_DT,RSLTKEY,LEVEL_BEFORE_ADJUST, LEVEL_AFTER_ADJUST,ADJUST_REASON,RES_POST_ID,POST_ID,LAST_UPD_DT,LAST_UPD_USER,GRANULARITY,ORGANKEY) values( #audit_no#,#party_id#,#statistic_dt#,#rsltkey#,#level_before_adjust#, #level_after_adjust#,#adjust_reason#,#res_post_id#,#post_id#,#last_upd_dt#,#last_upd_user#,#granularity#,#organkey# )

UPDATE T37_PARTY_RESULT T SET T.STATUS_CD=#status_cd#,T.CURR_POST=#curr_post#,T.LEVELKEY='',T.RETURN_REASON=#return_reason#,T.TEMPCATEGORY='3' WHERE T.RESULEKEY IN ($resulekey$)
T.ORGANKEY IN ($organkey_s$)

select a.elementkey,a.upelementkey,a.base_occ as base_occ_d,a.score as score_d,'1' as js_type,b.is_last from t37_appr_bas_rslt a,T31_DEF_ELEMENT b where a.elementkey=b.elementkey and resulekey=#resulekey#
a.ORGANKEY=#organkey#
union select elementkey,upelementkey,base_occ as base_occ_d,0 as score_d,js_type,is_last from T31_DEF_ELEMENT where is_last='0' and templatekey=#templatekey#

SELECT R.RESULEKEY,R.PARTY_ID, R.PARTY_CHN_NAME, R.LEVELKEY,R.FRISTAPPRALEVEL, R.EMENDATIONLEVEL,R.TEMPTYPE,R.GRANULARITY,R.TEMPLATEKEY, R.STATISTIC_DT,R.PARTY_CLASS_CD,R.CURR_POST,R.GSKEY,R.SCORE,R.LASTSCORE,R.RETURN_REASON FROM T37_PARTY_RESULT R WHERE R.PARTY_ID =#party_id#
